properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 7:30AM EST until February 10 at 9:28PM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...

Cape Fear River At Fayetteville affecting Cumberland County
...Basin average rainfall of 1 to 3 inches will cause minor
flooding on the Cape Fear river...

The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Cape Fear River At Fayetteville.
* from this afternoon to Monday evening, or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  7:00 AM Friday the stage was 29.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 35.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by late
this afternoon and continue to rise to near 47.0 feet by tomorrow
early afternoon.The river will fall below flood stage by late
Monday morning.
* Impact...Above 35 feet the boat ramp and lower parking lot at Riverside
Bait and Tackle off Person Street are flooded. The stage and lower
seating area at the Cape Fear amphitheater are flooded. At 48.0 feet,
the upper parking areas at Riverside Bait and Tackle are flooded.
There is significant lowland flooding downstream.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
